author: olamy
msg: modify the logic as commons-configuration will store 'ou=People,dc=archiva,dc=apache,dc=org' in a 'List' mode due to comma separator so using getProperty do not retrieve all values.
So moving to getList for String an concat them using defaut delimiter comma.
